Articles.Content:
The first parts pack from the newly formed Broman Empire!

The recently formed Broman Empire decided that the first thing it needed to do was get into space by any-means necessary. So they created a fuel called Ubernerium 897 and loaded it into a rocket and crossed their fingers. Ceaser Theodore Broosevelt made an unintelligible statement shortly after the first successful launch about carrying large schticks.

Planned parts include a high powered heavy lifter liquid rocket, a pimpin Command Module, and a OP fuel tank!

This is the Heavy Lifter Engine, I need a good color scheme for this pack, if you have any ideas, let me know please!

Here is my Prototype HeavyFuel Tank specially built to satisfy the insatiable hunger of the Heavy Lifter.

Pictures include parts from Pelf\'s ExPI pack.

The Heavy lifter is quite self-explanatory, it is designed to get those large stations of yours into orbit.

The HeavyFuel Tank is designed to power the Heavy Lifter with even the biggest loads.

More Pics Coming Soon!
No offense, but you really should have some parts done already before making a release thread.
Well im not completely from nothing, i have finished some modelling and am now struggling with textures

NOT TO BE MISTAKEN WITH BRONIES! BRONIES ARE FUDGING STUPID.

You know insulting a major following in your first post isn\'t the greatest way to start out. I would kindly recommend that you pull that out of the post. Some people will start arguments over stuff like that and lets face it we don\'t need another argument on this topic. But I digress welcome to the forums and I look forward to seeing some awesome parts!

There have been a ton of other people who have posted addons/plugins long before their release. Heck even Nova posted the Vanguard shuttle thing months before it was finished. Lay off the guy.
